choices.text:
### System: You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can. ### User: How do you align a row of divs to the right using flex in css? Show me an example. ### Response: Here is one way to achieve this using CSS Flexbox: ```css
Item 1
Item 2
Item 3
.container { display: flex; } .row { flex-direction: row; } ```
